extension.name: FavSlider Pro
extension.author: FavThemes
extension.description:
FavSlider Pro is a responsive Joomla! slideshow with multiple image and caption layouts, CSS3 effects, video support, 24 slides per module and optional HikaShop compatiblity.
For more info, please see the demo and documentation for the FavSlider Pro module.



Copyright © 2012-2017 FavThemes.

field.name: jquery_load
field.label: Load Joomla! jQuery
field.description: This setting loads Joomla!'s jQuery library. Choose NO if your website loads jQuery from an external source.

field.name: slideshow_type
field.label: Slideshow Type
field.description: Choose a style type for the slideshow layout, either basic or thumbnails.

field.name: transition_effect
field.label: Transition Effect
field.description: Choose the transition effect for the slideshow, either slide or fade.

field.name: carousel_autorun
field.label: Slideshow Autorun
field.description: Choose to animate the slideshow automatically.

field.name: cycling_speed
field.label: Slideshow Cycling Speed
field.description: Insert the speed of the slideshow, in milliseconds. Insert only the value, for example: 5000, not 5000ms. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: show_image
field.label: Show Images/Videos
field.description: Choose if the slideshow images/videos should be displayed or not.

field.name: show_title
field.label: Show Caption Title
field.description: Choose if the caption title for the slideshow should be displayed or not.

field.name: show_description
field.label: Show Caption Description
field.description: Choose if the caption description for the slideshow should be displayed or not.

field.name: show_readmore
field.label: Show Caption Read More
field.description: Choose if the Read More button for the slideshow should be displayed or not.

field.name: slideshow_layout
field.label: Slideshow Layout
field.description: Choose the image/video layout for the slideshow.

field.name: caption_style
field.label: Caption Style
field.description: Set the caption style for the slideshow when the SLIDESHOW LAYOUT setting is set to DEFAULT.

field.name: caption_color
field.label: Caption Color
field.description: Set the caption color for the slideshow when the SLIDESHOW LAYOUT setting is set to DEFAULT.

field.name: caption_center_width
field.label: Caption Width
field.description: Insert the width for the caption using pixels, percent or em (for example: 400px, 120% or 1.2em, not 400). This setting applies only when the SLIDESHOW LAYOUT setting is set to DEFAULT. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: caption_height
field.label: Caption Height
field.description: Insert the height for the caption using pixels, percent or em (for example: 200px, 120% or 1.2em, not 200). This setting applies only when the SLIDESHOW LAYOUT setting is set to DEFAULT. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: image_width
field.label: Image/Video Width
field.description: Choose the width for the image or video when the SLIDESHOW LAYOUT setting is set to IMAGE LEFT or IMAGE RIGHT.

field.name: image_border_radius
field.label: Image Border Radius
field.description: Insert the border-radius for the image using pixels or percent (for example: 140px or 80%, not 140). Note that the CSS3 features are not supported by older browsers. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: video_height
field.label: Video Height
field.description: Insert the height for the video when the SLIDESHOW LAYOUT setting is set to DEFAULT, using pixels (for example: 500px, not 100). A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: thumbnails_width
field.label: Thumbnails Width
field.description: Insert the width for the thumbnails when the SLIDESHOW TYPE setting is set to THUMBNAILS, using pixels (for example: 500px, not 100). A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: thumbnails_height
field.label: Thumbnails Height
field.description: Insert the height for the thumbnails when the SLIDESHOW TYPE setting is set to THUMBNAILS, using pixels (for example: 60px, not 60). A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: title_google_font
field.label: Title Google Font
field.description: Insert the name of the Google Font for the title, for example Open Sans or Roboto. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: title_font_weight
field.label: Title Font Weight
field.description: Set the font weight for the title of the caption.

field.name: title_font_style
field.label: Title Font Style
field.description: Set the font style for the title of the caption.

field.name: title_font_size
field.label: Title Font Size
field.description: Insert the font size for the title of the caption using pixels, percent or em (for example: 14px, 120% or 1.2em, not 14). A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: title_line_height
field.label: Title Line Height
field.description: Insert the line height for the title of the caption using pixels or em (for example: 14px or 1.2em, not 14). The line-height property is used to modify the spacing between the lines of text. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: title_text_align
field.label: Title Text Align
field.description: Choose the text alignment for the title of the caption.

field.name: title_text_transform
field.label: Title Text Transform
field.description: Choose the text transform for the title of the caption.

field.name: title_margin
field.label: Title Margin
field.description: Insert the margin for the title of the caption using pixels or percent (for example: 14px or 10%, not 14). The margin is a CSS property that sets the space around the content, including the padding. The margin can have from 1 to 4 values (top, right, bottom and left). A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: description_limit
field.label: Description Text Limit
field.description: Select the maximum number of characters that will be displayed from the product's description. The text will be trimmed to the last full word.

field.name: description_text_color
field.label: Description Text Color
field.description: Choose the color for the description text. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: description_google_font
field.label: Description Google Font
field.description: Insert the name of the Google Font for the description text, for example Open Sans or Roboto. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: description_font_weight
field.label: Description Font Weight
field.description: Set the font weight for the description text.

field.name: description_font_style
field.label: Description Font Style
field.description: Set the font style for the description text.

field.name: description_text_font_size
field.label: Description Font Size
field.description: Insert the font size for the description text using pixels, percent or em (for example: 14px, 120% or 1.2em, not 14). A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: description_text_line_height
field.label: Description Line Height
field.description: Insert the line height for the description text using pixels or em (for example: 14px or 1.2em, not 14). The line-height property is used to modify the spacing between the lines of text. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: description_text_align
field.label: Description Text Align
field.description: Choose the text align for the description text.

field.name: description_text_margin
field.label: Description Margin
field.description: Insert the margin for the description text using pixels or percent (for example: 14px or 10%, not 14). The margin is a CSS property that sets the space around the content, including the padding. The margin can have from 1 to 4 values (top, right, bottom and left). A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: readmore_text_color
field.label: Read More Color
field.description: Choose the color for the Read More text. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: readmore_text_bg_color
field.label: Read More Background Color
field.description: Choose the color for the background of the Read More text. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: readmore_text_bg_color_hover
field.label: Read More Background Color Hover
field.description: Choose the color for the background of the Read More text on mouse hover. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: readmore_google_font
field.label: Read More Google Font
field.description: Insert the name of the Google Font for the Read More text, for example Open Sans or Roboto. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: readmore_font_weight
field.label: Read More Font Weight
field.description: Set the font weight for the Read More text.

field.name: readmore_font_style
field.label: Read More Font Style
field.description: Set the font style for the Read More text.

field.name: readmore_text_font_size
field.label: Read More Font Size
field.description: Insert the font size for the Read More text using pixels, percent or em (for example: 14px, 120% or 1.2em, not 14). A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: readmore_text_line_height
field.label: Read More Line Height
field.description: Insert the line height for the Read More text using pixels or em (for example: 14px or 1.2em, not 14). The line-height property is used to modify the spacing between the lines of text. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: readmore_text_align
field.label: Read More Align
field.description: Choose the align for the Read More button.

field.name: readmore_text_padding
field.label: Read More Padding
field.description: Insert the padding for the Read More text using pixels or percent (for example: 14px or 10%, not 14). The padding is a CSS property that sets the space around the content. The padding can have from 1 to 4 values (top, right, bottom and left). A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: readmore_text_transform
field.label: Read More Text Transform
field.description: Choose the text transform for the Read More text.

field.name: readmore_border_radius
field.label: Read More Border Radius
field.description: Insert the border-radius for the Read More text using pixels or percent (for example: 140px or 80%, not 140). Note that the CSS3 features are not supported by older browsers. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: show_mobile_title
field.label: Show Mobile Caption Title
field.description: Choose if the caption title for the slideshow should be displayed or not on mobile devices.

field.name: show_mobile_description
field.label: Show Mobile Caption Description
field.description: Choose if the caption description for the slideshow should be displayed or not on mobile devices.

field.name: show_mobile_readmore
field.label: Show Mobile Caption Read More
field.description: Choose if the Read More button for the slideshow should be displayed or not on mobile devices.

field.name: caption_hide
field.label: Mobile Caption Hide
field.description: Insert the maximum width of the device when the caption is no longer visible using pixels (for example: 420px not 420). For example, when setting the caption hide to 420px, the caption is no longer visible for any device with a width smaller than 420px. This setting applies only when the SLIDESHOW LAYOUT setting is set to DEFAULT. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: show_arrows
field.label: Show Arrows
field.description: Choose if the arrows for the slideshow should be displayed or not.

field.name: arrows_position
field.label: Arrows Position
field.description: Choose a position for the carousel navigation arrows.

field.name: arrows_align
field.label: Arrows Alignment
field.description: Choose the alignment for the carousel navigation arrows when the arrows are positioned to the top or bottom.

field.name: arrows_color
field.label: Arrows Color
field.description: Choose the color for the carousel navigation arrows. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: arrows_bg_color
field.label: Arrows Background Color
field.description: Choose the background color for the carousel navigation arrows. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: arrows_border_radius
field.label: Arrows Border Radius
field.description: Insert the border-radius for the arrows using pixels or percent (for example: 140px or 80%, not 140). For circle background shapes for arrows, choose the 50% value. Note that the CSS3 features are not supported by older browsers. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: show_indicators
field.label: Show Indicators
field.description: Choose if the bullet indicators for the slideshow should be displayed or not.

field.name: indicators_color
field.label: Indicators Color
field.description: Choose if the color for the bullet indicators.

field.name: indicators_active_color
field.label: Indicators Active Color
field.description: Choose the color for the active bullet indicator. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: indicators_style
field.label: Indicators Style
field.description: Choose the style for the bullet indicators.

field.name: indicators_align
field.label: Indicators Align
field.description: Choose the align for the bullet indicators.

field.name: hikashop_menu_id
field.label: HikaShop Menu ID
field.description: Insert the HikaShop menu ID to be used by the module in order to autogenerate any HikaShop related URLs.

field.name: use_hikashop_category
field.label: Use HikaShop Category
field.description: Use data from a specific HikaShop category. This will disable all the other product or custom content fields.

field.name: category_number_of_products
field.label: Number of displayed products
field.description: Select the maximum number of products you want to display from that particular category. Please leave this field blank for displaying all the category products.

field.name: category_order_by
field.label: Order category products by
field.description: Choose the rule for ordering the category products.

field.name: image_effect
field.label: Image Effect
field.description: Choose a CSS3 effect for the image on slide and page scroll and load. Note that the CSS3 features are not supported by older browsers.

field.name: caption_effect
field.label: Caption Effect
field.description: Choose a CSS3 effect for the caption on slide and page scroll and load. The caption for the slideshow includes the title, the description and the readmore button. Each one of the caption elements can be enabled/disabled from the MODULE SETTINGS tab. Note that the CSS3 features are not supported by older browsers.

field.name: show_slide1
field.label: Show Slide 1
field.description: Choose if this slide should be displayed or not.

field.name: use_hikashop_product1
field.label: Use HikaShop Product 1
field.description: Use data from a specific HikaShop product. This will disable all the other custom fields for this particular entry.

field.name: image_effect1
field.label: Image 1 Effect
field.description: Choose a CSS3 effect for the image on slide and page scroll and load. Note that the CSS3 features are not supported by older browsers.

field.name: caption_effect1
field.label: Caption 1 Effect
field.description: Choose a CSS3 effect for the caption on slide and page scroll and load. The caption for the slideshow includes the title, the description and the readmore button. Each one of the caption elements can be enabled/disabled from the MODULE SETTINGS tab. Note that the CSS3 features are not supported by older browsers.

field.name: slide_type1
field.label: Slide 1 Type
field.description: Choose the type of slide, either an image or a video.

field.name: upload_image1
field.label: Image 1 Upload
field.description: Upload the image for this slide if the SLIDE TYPE setting is IMAGE. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: image_alt1
field.label: Image 1 Alt Text
field.description: Insert the text for the image Alt. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: image_link1
field.label: Image 1 Link
field.description: Insert the URL for the image for this slide if the SLIDE TYPE setting is IMAGE and the IMAGE ALIGN setting is FULL-WIDTH. Note that the link must include http:// or https://. A blank field means that no link is assigned to the image.

field.name: image_link_target1
field.label: Image 1 Link Target
field.description: Choose the target for the URL of the image for this slide if the SLIDE TYPE setting is IMAGE.

field.name: video_source1
field.label: Video 1 Source
field.description: Choose the type of source for the video, either YouTube or Vimeo, if the SLIDE TYPE setting is VIDEO.

field.name: video_id1
field.label: Video 1 ID
field.description: Insert the ID for the YouTube video, if the SLIDE TYPE setting is VIDEO (for example: abcde for an URL like https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=abcde or 12345 for an URL like https://vimeo.com/12345).

field.name: title_text1
field.label: Title 1 Text
field.description: Insert the text for the title of the caption. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: title_color1
field.label: Title 1 Color
field.description: Choose the color for the title of the caption. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: title_link1
field.label: Title 1 Link
field.description: Insert the URL for the title of the caption. Note that the link must include http:// or https://. A blank field means that no link is assigned to the image.

field.name: title_link_target1
field.label: Title 1 Link Target
field.description: Choose the target for the URL of the title of the caption.

field.name: description_text1
field.default: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.
field.label: Description 1 Text
field.description: Insert the text for the description of the caption. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: readmore_text1
field.label: Read More 1 Text
field.description: Insert the text for the Read More button inside the caption. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: readmore_link1
field.label: Read More 1 Link
field.description: Insert the URL for the Read More text inside the caption. Note that the link must include http:// or https://. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: readmore_link_target1
field.label: Read More 1 Link Target
field.description: Choose the target of the URL for the Read More text link inside the caption.

field.label: Show Slide 2

field.name: show_slide5
field.label: Show Slide 5
field.description: Choose if this slide should be displayed or not.

field.name: use_hikashop_product5
field.label: Use HikaShop Product 5
field.description: Use data from a specific HikaShop product. This will disable all the other custom fields for this particular entry.

field.name: image_effect5
field.label: Image 5 Effect
field.description: Choose a CSS3 effect for the image on slide and page scroll and load. Note that the CSS3 features are not supported by older browsers.

field.name: caption_effect5
field.label: Caption 5 Effect
field.description: Choose a CSS3 effect for the caption on slide and page scroll and load. The caption for the slideshow includes the title, the description and the readmore button. Each one of the caption elements can be enabled/disabled from the MODULE SETTINGS tab. Note that the CSS3 features are not supported by older browsers.

field.name: slide_type5
field.label: Slide 5 Type
field.description: Choose the type of slide, either an image or a video.

field.label: Image 5 Upload
field.description: Upload the image for this slide if the SLIDE TYPE setting is IMAGE. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: image_alt5
field.label: Image 5 Alt Text
field.description: Insert the text for the image Alt. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: image_link5
field.label: Image 5 Link
field.description: Insert the URL for the image for this slide if the SLIDE TYPE setting is IMAGE and the IMAGE ALIGN setting is FULL-WIDTH. Note that the link must include http:// or https://. A blank field means that no link is assigned to the image.

field.name: image_link_target5
field.label: Image 5 Link Target
field.description: Choose the target for the URL of the image for this slide if the SLIDE TYPE setting is IMAGE.

field.name: video_source5
field.label: Video 5 Source
field.description: Choose the type of source for the video, either YouTube or Vimeo, if the SLIDE TYPE setting is VIDEO.

field.name: video_id5
